descriptions.validator: Run SHACL checks with Monaco + TanStack

stats.title: RDF snapshot
stats.subtitle: Detected resources
stats.empty: Paste RDF to surface quick stats here.

command.empty: No matches. Try a different keyword.

home.title: RDF Metadata Validator
home.subtitle: Validate your metadata against standard SHACL profiles (DCAT-AP, DCAT-AP-ES, NTI-RISP) directly in your browser.

validator.placeholder: Paste your RDF content here (Turtle, RDF/XML, JSON-LD)...
validator.corsWarning: Note: Some servers may block requests from the browser (CORS). If validation fails, try downloading the file and pasting the content directly.
validator.urlError: Failed to fetch content from URL. It might be due to CORS restrictions. Try copying the content and pasting it in the "Text Input" tab.
validator.workspaceSubtitle: Paste RDF, fetch from URL, or upload heavy catalogs with progress tracking.

actions.pasteDescription: Write or paste RDF with Monaco and preview transformations.
actions.urlDescription: Probe a remote catalog, inspect metadata and validate in place.
actions.uploadDescription: Drop huge TTL/JSON-LD files with chunked streaming and cancel options.

validator.dropTitle: Drop a TTL / RDF / JSON-LD file
validator.dropSubtitle: Files stay in the browser. Maximize reliability with chunked reads.

results.detailsDescription: Group duplicated findings, pin columns, and export filtered views.

viewer.title: SHACL Report Viewer
viewer.subtitle: Visualize existing SHACL validation reports (Turtle format).
viewer.importDescription: Upload TTL files or paste raw RDF, then unlock analytics and exports.
viewer.error: Failed to parse SHACL report. Ensure it is valid Turtle (TTL) format.
viewer.topShapesHint: Shapes and constraints with the highest number of issues.
viewer.emptyStats: Import a report to unlock severity analytics.
viewer.emptyShapes: Upload a SHACL report to highlight the noisiest shapes.

guide.title: SHACL Guide
guide.description: SHACL (Shapes Constraint Language) is a W3C standard that validates RDF graphs against reusable shapes so data stays aligned with models such as DCAT-AP.

steps.selectProfile: Select the Validation Profile you need (for example DCAT-AP-ES).
steps.directInputDescription: Paste RDF content (Turtle, RDF/XML, JSON-LD) directly into the text area.
steps.fromUrlDescription: Provide a link to an RDF file. Keep in mind that some servers can block browser requests because of CORS.
steps.validate: Click Validate to launch the SHACL checks.
steps.review: Review the result table and filter by severity (Violation, Warning, Info).
steps.export: Export the report in Turtle or CSV to share evidence of the validation run.

violation.title: Violation
violation.description: Blocking issues that must be fixed for the dataset to conform.

warning.title: Warning
warning.description: Important issues that should be addressed even if they might not break conformance depending on the profile.

info.title: Info
info.description: Suggestions or contextual notes that can help improve metadata quality.

settings.appearanceDescription: Switch between light and dark tokens for the entire workspace.
settings.themeDescription: Toggle to apply the dark palette across the app shell.
settings.themeNote: Preference is stored locally so deployments stay untouched.
settings.designTokensDescription: Customize CSS variables to adapt typography, spacing, and palettes.

tokens.background: Base surface for cards and shell.
tokens.foreground: Default text color across the UI.
tokens.primary: Primary accent for buttons and highlights.
tokens.accent: Secondary accent used in gradients and chips.
tokens.border: Soft border color for cards and tables.
tokens.radius: Global border radius used by cards and buttons.

zen.label: Zen aqua
zen.description: Soft greens and teals to highlight successful validations.

midnight.label: Midnight
midnight.description: High-contrast dark palette for long review sessions.

citrus.label: Citrus
citrus.description: Warm energetic accents to call out issues quickly.

workspace.title: Workspace tools
workspace.subtitle: Manage the caches that stay in this browser.

history.title: Reset validation history
history.description: Clear sparkline data and statistics stored from recent runs.

theme.title: Reset theme preference
theme.description: Return to the system color scheme and drop the manual toggle.

feedback.theme: Theme preference synced with the system.
